I get that blockchain technology has a goal here but I am challenged to see why the market for this token / coin will grow and why consumers will pay for it. Title: [ANN][ICO] n'cloud.swiss - THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO AWS, AZURE, GCP & CO.
Body: Hi everyone,  We have got great news to share with you today.  First one: We are happy to announce that our NCU tokens will be listed on exchanges after the ICO is terminated. After the legal situation has been further verified, we do proceed in preparing the listing of the NCU token on selected exchanges. Investors now have a short-, medium- or long-term exit with our token strategy!  Second one: We have extended the deadline for our Pre-ICO. The deadline has now been set for today April, 29th, 2018 at 9 pm (CET).  Third one: Tomorrow we will be heading towards the launch of our ICO. The starting price of 1 NCU token in the ICO phase is CHF 0.31. Benefit from a 3 for 1 token ratio incentive during the ICO. For each tranch of at least 1.000 tokens purchased, there is a 3 for 1 token payout.  More at https://www.ncloud.swiss/ICO

Surely a delicate investment matter, we have therefore elaborated an exit strategy for everybody.  *Short-term: Go for the option of selling NCU tokens on a exchange or buy any of our services or products as more than 4‚Äô000 users are already doing today! *Mid-term: Wait for the launch of the NCS security token, exchange your NCU tokens into NCS tokens and wait until the NCS token is ready for sale on selected exchanges. *Long-term: Change your NCU tokens into NCS tokens and benefit from profit-sharing, discounts and other great benefits.  Do not hesitate to get in touch for any questions. You can buy our tokens here https://ncloud.swiss/ico/buy-ncu/  https://i.imgur.com/b4G66gO.png

Author: yma2018
Title: [ANN][ICO] n'cloud.swiss - THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO AWS, AZURE, GCP & CO.
Body: Yes you do need for several good reasons Let me name you a few:  - The digital ID helps us to perform KYC/AML checks (Know your customer / Anti-money laundering laws) - Due to known identity and token batch, we recognize theft or hacking of tokens and can void them. The legitimate owner of the tokens gets the tokens back or new ones - The digital ID replaces username and password and enables you access on n‚Äôcloud.swiss, n‚ÄôSTORE or n‚ÄôWORLD - The NCU tokens are in a closed circuit. That gives the token holders a much higher security  All in all, KYC process make possible high standards in terms of security. Again an important feature of our "Swiss made" DNA.

Author: Crypto_invest12
Title: [ANN][ICO] n'cloud.swiss - THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO AWS, AZURE, GCP & CO.
Body: Thank you for your reply. Indeed KYC/AML are important to guarantee security and protection. I understand that.

Title: [ANN][ICO] n'cloud.swiss - THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO AWS, AZURE, GCP & CO.
Body: I'm getting curious now. It's good to know that you are not those vanishing projects if their ICO ain't successful. I know cloud computing is seen as the next big thing. This is why I consider your ICO very exciting. But what makes you sure that n'cloud.swiss can compete with the big cloud providers?

Author: yma2018
Title: [ANN][ICO] n'cloud.swiss - THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO AWS, AZURE, GCP & CO.
Body: The answer is quite simple. The public cloud market is dominated by four American giants (Amazon, Microsoft, Google and IBM)  and one Chinese giant (Alibaba). So who do you trust more? Well knowing there's a serious Swiss/European alternative is quite good to hear isn't it?  n‚Äôcloud.swiss is more than just a cloud. Companies with the need of deploying a cloud ON-PREM go for n‚Äôcloud.swiss ON-PREM, customers looking for deployments in a public cloud go for the n‚Äôcloud.swiss service cloud and select services and products there, using both models is for those customers aiming for hybrid clouds ‚Äì it‚Äôs simply ‚ÄúMake your own cloud‚Äù.  Keep in mind that our ICO is the ICO of a proven cloud business case. We have cloud experience since 2009. n‚Äôcloud.swiss service cloud (public) is hosted in high security locations, administered by us, a Swiss company operating in a SWISS legal environment protected by one of the world‚Äôs most rigid data privacy laws.  Moreover, we offer personal support for any company / user ‚Äì we care about our customers. Last but not least, competitive pricing allow us to be a real threat to the established cloud providers.

Author: yma2018
Title: [ANN][ICO] n'cloud.swiss - THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO AWS, AZURE, GCP & CO.
Body: Because companies move their developments from other major clouds (AWS, Azure, GCP, IBM, Alibabacloud) to us for the following reasons :  - We have cloud experience since 2009. - We are more than just a cloud and capable of addressing and serving all cloud deployment requirements. In addition, all cloud service models from IaaS to PaaS and SaaS are included within the same product. - Swissness in every single aspect of our products and services. Our service cloud (public) is hosted in high security locations, administered by us, a Swiss company operating in a Swiss legal environment protected by one of the world‚Äôs most rigid data privacy laws. - Personal support for any company and user. We do care about our customers. - Competitive pricing.  All in all, we are a globally expanding company. Our customers have also the unique opportunity of growing with us. So do investors as well by supporting our ICO.

Author: yma2018
Title: [ANN][ICO] n'cloud.swiss - THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO AWS, AZURE, GCP & CO.
Body: It's not all about being Swiss. For us it's also some sort of pressure! We have to deserve that Swiss reputation and keep it as high as possible given the fact that we have a number of customers who have been trusting us for years. The good thing is, it motivates us a lot

Author: yma2018
Title: [ANN][ICO] n'cloud.swiss - THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO AWS, AZURE, GCP & CO.
Body: That's a good point. It definitely is not enough to say we are a successful business case with a successful track record. Being Swiss is a plus again but not enough either. So let me give you bullet points. Given the number of ICOs popping up day in, day out, why should you invest in our ICO? This is what you are wondering right?  Reason 1: n'cloud.swiss AG is not a start-up ‚Äì it's a fully functional business operation with real customers, revenues, profits and a successful track record. In other words, 17 years of IT experience and 9 years in cloud computing as one of Europe‚Äôs cloud pioneers with our own cloud platform since 2009. Reason 2: Buy NCU tokens now and benefit from many advantages. As a customer, NCU tokens enable you to use them for discounted purchase at n'cloud.swiss AG. Reason 3: Last but not least, exchange the NCU tokens into NCS tokens later this year and sell them on selected exchanges or exchange the NCU tokens into NCS tokens and benefit from long-term perspectives such as profit sharing or increasing token price.  There are many other reasons but I would say those three are the ones that speak for themselves. Do not hesitate to get in touch if you have further questions.  By the way, we just got a video review published about our ICO.  https://youtu.be/kTI3BphcZIs  Kind regards,  Yahya

Title: [ANN][ICO] n'cloud.swiss - THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO AWS, AZURE, GCP & CO.

We are also happy to announce and just in time, both Android and IOS releases have been approved in their respective app stores and are now available as updates!  This means that any individual onboarding a document onto Yoti will now be able to onboard not only one of 147 international country passports but they will also now be able to onboard any one of the documents. Meaning individuals will now be able to share their address (taken from their document, if available on document) and share that attribute via their Yoti app, alongside all other KYC identity attributes.  We are looking forward for a successful ICO!  https://ncu.netkom.ch/

Title: [ANN][ICO] n'cloud.swiss - THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO AWS, AZURE, GCP & CO.

Wherever we see potential, partners, possibilities of creating joint ventures, we go there.  We have an all in one cloud platform with which we can compete with major cloud providers √† la Amazon AWS and Microsoft Azure. The USP we have compared to the major cloud providers is that our solution also comes in an on-premises variant. Moreover, we offer personal support and data centers are located in the Swiss mountains.

Body: This project is amazing! ICOs are in most cases launched to realise a project. So investing in a project you don't know if it is realised one day is quite risky. With n'cloud.swiss I see the opportunity of investing in something real! I will definitely have a closer look in your whitepaper. Finally something which is a real business. So Pre-ICO is on 14th right?

Author: Crypto_invest12
Title: [ANN][ICO] n'cloud.swiss - THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO AWS, AZURE, GCP & CO.
Body: From what I see, it is a well thought project. Your goals are very ambitious. All in all, a very promising ICO. After all what else to expect from a swiss project ;-)  However, I would never invest in anything unless there's not a working prototype. Or do you have something? What happens if your ICO isn't successful? Most projects are not realised in such cases, are they?

Author: yma2018
Title: [ANN][ICO] n'cloud.swiss - THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO AWS, AZURE, GCP & CO.
Body: Thanks for your interest in our ICO. We give our best in having swiss quality in all aspects of our products, services and of course our ICO as well.  Regarding your questions, n‚Äôcloud.swiss is a finished product with real customers and transactions in place. So yeah we have a fully functional product! To finish with your questions on what would happen if our ICO is not successful, the good news is, we follow our goals and milestones independently from results achieved in the ICO. The platform located in Switzerland runs successfully and the projects for the same in India and Pakistan for example are already in progress.

Author: yma2018
Title: [ANN][ICO] n'cloud.swiss - THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO AWS, AZURE, GCP & CO.
Body: We plan first local operations in India and Pakistan where we are already present with our platform. Other operations are planned in Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, Ukraine, Russia and Poland. Countries known for their DevOps are of great interest.   Other targeted markets are spread around Europe. We just started developing the French market with a Country Manager there. In addition, we will go into the Middle East, Asia Pacific, Africa and the Americas. The idea is to either launch joint-ventures, local representations with partners or n‚Äôcloud.swiss subsidiaries or franchisees. Always under the brand name n‚Äôcloud.swiss.  I would be pleased having you in our Telegram community https://www.t.me/ncloudswiss  Kind regards,  Yahya

Author: yma2018
Title: [ANN][ICO] n'cloud.swiss - THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO AWS, AZURE, GCP & CO.
Body: n‚Äôcloud.swiss ‚Äì The ICO of a successful cloud business case expanding worldwide into 60 countries   READ THE WHITEPAPER   https://i.imgur.com/PYE1gQv.png   n‚Äôcloud.swiss ‚Äì THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO THE MAJOR CLOUD PLATFORMS AS A PUBLIC, PRIVATE OR ON-PREM CLOUD SOLUTION FOR DEVELOPERS, CONSULTANTS, SOFTWARE HOUSES AND MAJOR COMPANIES   Website | Bounty Program | LinkedIn | Twitter | Facebook | Xing | Telegram Channel | Telegram Group  In contrast to the majority of other ICO-launches in the marketplace n‚Äôcloud.swiss is not a start-up operation. The initiator of n‚Äôcloud.swiss AG - Netkom IT Services GmbH - is a Swiss based IT & cloud provider with a proven track record of 17 years of successful operations in various countries. Founded in 2001, the company has gone through several transformation processes itself or with its customers. In the early 2000‚Äôs the company operated mainly in the field of IT-Strategy and Technology consulting for well-known large national and international companies. As the team was growing more classic IT- and virtualization projects were realized for SME‚Äôs. In 2009 the decision was taken to launch n‚Äôcloud ‚Äì one of Europe‚Äôs first IaaS/SaaS cloud platforms ‚Äì into the marketplace. With the well established n‚Äôcloud products, Netkom became one of the cloud pioneers in Europe. n‚Äôcloud.swiss is therefore already a successful cloud platform running in one of the world‚Äôs most secure data centers in Switzerland with existing customers, transactions and success stories in Switzerland, Germany, India, Russia, Pakistan and Ukraine.  https://i.imgur.com/n6Cs2bIh.png  Vision  The Vision of n‚Äôcloud.swiss is to become the SWISS alternative to the major five cloud providers.  https://i.imgur.com/F8dmnrml.png  Mission  The n‚Äôcloud.swiss ICO with its NCU token has been launched to successfully expand and roll-out the existing business operations into 60 additional countries around the world.  https://i.imgur.com/DkDW9oS.png  The cloud market revenue doubles in the next 3 years up to 162 billion USD  The target for n‚Äôcloud.swiss is to grab a substantial market share in the global cloud market for IaaS, PaaS, SaaS services in the next 5 years. The revenues in this market double in the next 3 years from 89 billion USD in 2017 to 162 billion USD in 2020.  https://i.imgur.com/tjG2t8Rl.png  The cloud competition in the world ‚Äì USA versus the rest of the World  Today more than 65% of the cloud computing market is occupied by a few leading giant providers. The Top 4 major cloud platforms are originating from the US, while No. 5 - Alibaba Cloud - comes from China - the remaining 35% market share is in the hands of thousands of cloud providers scattered around the world.  https://i.imgur.com/OagblX1l.png  The product offer ‚Äì Make your own Public, Private or Hybrid cloud  n‚Äôcloud.swiss heralds a new era in cloud computing and is capable to address and serve all cloud deployment requirements such as private, public, hybrid or community cloud. It also contains all cloud service models such as Infrastructure-, Platform- or Software-as-a-Service models with the same product.    n‚Äôcloud.swiss ICO ‚Äì THE UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY OF SUPPORTING A PROVEN BUSINESS CASE TO GROW GLOBAL AND BECOME A REAL CLOUD ALTERNATIVE TO THE MAJOR WELL ESTABLISHED CLOUD PROVIDERS IN THE WORLD  A total of 600 Mio. tokens are released and called NCU.  https://i.imgur.com/xacAiD5h.jpg  The presale of NCU tokens will begin on April 14th, 2018 at 09:00 (CET) and end on April 29th, 2018 at 21:00 (CET). Total number of NCU tokens in the pre-ICO phase is 32 Mio. NCU tokens which equals 2 Mio. NCU tokens per day. The price of 1 NCU token during the pre-ICO is starting at CHF 0.10. The final price in the pre-ICO will be CHF 0.25. Due to fees and exchange rates, the minimum amount to purchase NCU tokens is CHF 50 per token-buy-transaction. Pre-ICO can be completed ahead of schedule in case of attracting the necessary amount of investments before the end of the pre-ICO period.  NCU tokens are created on the Ethereum blockchain-platform under the ERC20 token standard. There is no reissue of tokens after the financing is completed. Tokens are accepted as a payment for n‚Äôcloud.swiss services. Tokens being used as a payment instrument will expire. All undigested and undistributed tokens will be distributed/invested in country and technology partnerships or as an incentive for new or existing staff members.  https://i.imgur.com/dZVhw0Gh.png  Distribution of NCU tokens and benefits for investors  NCU utility tokens will be accepted as a payment instrument earliest 6 months after the ICO is terminated.  - NCU tokens are accepted as a payment instrument for all n'cloud.swiss services and products - For payments by NCU tokens, an additional 5% discount is granted - Payment balances of up to 25% per invoice can be paid by NCU tokens  After completion of the last ICO stage at CHF 1.00, all NCU tokens will be valued at a price of CHF 1.50 per token. The earlier a token has been bought during the whole ICO the more purchasing power a NCU token displays.  https://i.imgur.com/e0p58wHh.png  Bounty campaigns  We would like to reward users who will buy in and support the n‚Äôcloud.swiss ICO campaign before and during the ICO stages. For this we‚Äôve reserved 167 Mio. NCU tokens which equals almost 30% of the total number of tokens in play. The bounty campaign is active during the pre-ICO, scheduled from April 14th to April 29th 2018 and the main ICO, which will be started on April 30th 2018 to July 8th, 2018.  The bounty categories are as follows and will be presented in detail in a separate post dedicated to our bounty campaigns:  https://i.imgur.com/cPKsEUGh.png  Compliance with all applicable laws and regulations of Switzerland  We're commited to compliance with all applicable laws and regulations of Switzerland, therefore all technical market standards (e.g Blockchain) as well as any legal or regulatory guidelines by Swiss law will be regarded. Due to new guidelines by the Swiss Financial Market Supervisory Authority regarding ICO activities from February 2018, n'cloud.swiss has decided to launch two ICO rounds.  1. Launch of the NCU token as a pure utility token and therefore run the campaign as a pre-financing ICO with excellent incentives, purchasing advantages for n'cloud.swiss and all its products and services, as well as an increasing utility value of the NCU token.  2. Launch of the NCS token as a security token which demands for specific tightened legal requirements and obligations. This process shall be prepared during the NCU ICO and its start shall be in Q3/2018 with a higher pre-ICO starting price than the last stage of the NCU ICO. The NCS token shall grant even further advantages and shall be listed on digital stock exchanges.  A new ICO with a security token called NCS will start in Q3/2018. NCU token buyers will then be eligible to exchange their NCU tokens into NCS tokens and benefit from further advantages. Buyers of NCU tokens are eligible to exchange their NCU tokens into NCS security tokens, once this programme is in place. The NCS token will be launched to higher purchasing prices, so this gives also further incentives to NCU token buyers.  Distribution of collected funds  The amount of attracted investments during the pre-ICO is CHF 5.600.000 and the maximum amount of attracted investments during the ICO is: CHF 65.370.000.  https://i.imgur.com/02zBcZqh.png  Roadmap https://i.imgur.com/RsMLjUNh.png  Our Team  Our team consists of highly skilled professionals from the fields of Cloud Architecture, Development, Infrastructure, Security up to specialists being at home in the Technology and Service Environments such as Docker/Kubernetes, Blockchain, Artificial Intelligence, Big Data or Analytics.  n‚Äôcloud.swiss AG - BOARD OF DIRECTORS https://i.imgur.com/3O0DgCul.png | https://i.imgur.com/hIPdK0Il.png | https://i.imgur.com/zxiWMpVl.png  n‚Äôcloud.swiss AG - TEAMLEADERS https://i.imgur.com/DrP558Xl.png  READ THE WHITEPAPER  https://i.imgur.com/tpmoJJZh.png  Website | Bounty Program | LinkedIn | Twitter | Facebook | Xing | Telegram Channel | Telegram Group

Author: yma2018
Title: [ANN][ICO] n'cloud.swiss - THE SWISS ALTERNATIVE TO AWS, AZURE, GCP & CO.
Body: Well, considering the fact that our competitors are mainly AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, IBM and Alibabacloud, we are in this league the only cloud provider with an ICO. Moreover, we have the big advantage that we are also a multi-cloud vendor which means our solution is tailored to our customers' needs, in terms of public, private, hybrid and on-prem. This is something the big 5 cannot deliver. Therefore, most companies use something from AWS, Azure etc. as a mix of all.
